text: @piersmorgan @BorisJohnson Over70s stay at home vulnerable group and more likely to get acute pneumonia. Not enough ICU beds to treat all patients in the coming weeks given the numbers we are dealing with. The virus has been around now for weeks. This is a global pandemic. Stay at home best option left.
